name: media-pipeline
description: Generate AI images using Google Gemini. Create hero images, thumbnails, and visual content from text prompts.
long_description: A media asset generation server powered by Google Gemini AI. Supports multiple aspect ratios (1:1, 16:9, 9:16, etc.) and models for quality vs speed trade-offs. Images are saved to disk with file paths returned for easy integration into websites, presentations, and applications.

GEMINI_API_KEY.title: Gemini API Key
GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Your Google Gemini API key. Get one at https://aistudio.google.com/apikey

GEMINI_DEFAULT_MODEL.title: Default Model
GEMINI_DEFAULT_MODEL.description: Model to use for image generation (gemini-3-pro-image-preview for quality, gemini-2.5-flash-image for speed)

IMAGE_OUTPUT_DIR.title: Output Directory
IMAGE_OUTPUT_DIR.description: Directory where generated images will be saved

tools.name: create_asset
tools.description: Generate an image using Google Gemini AI. Provide a detailed prompt describing the desired image. The image will be saved to disk and the file path returned.
